How many people are affected by familial erythrocytosis ?,Familial erythrocytosis is a rare condition; its prevalence is unknown.,GHR,familial erythrocytosis
What are the genetic changes related to familial erythrocytosis ?,"Familial erythrocytosis can result from mutations
